CONTACT INFORMATION 
Address         Telephone: +44 754 631 5367 
2 Stockdale Close, Knaresborough, HG5 8EA     Email: mhairi.sellar@hotmail.co.uk  
ABOUT ME 
I have always been a keen problem solver with a love for maths, chemistry and physics. This was the catalyst for me 
exploring a career in chemical engineering. My time at university and in my career to date has allowed me to develop 
my knowledge and understanding of the sector and I have been able to use my ability to analyse and react to situations 
productively in order to complete projects. 
 
I am always keen to test myself, both in my personal and professional life, and always aim to make the most of any 
opportunity that is presented to me. This has been shown by my willingness to travel and integrate myself into differ  
 
 
CONTACT INFORMATION 
Address         Telephone: +44 754 631 5367 
2 Stockdale Close, Knaresborough, HG5 8EA     Email: mhairi.sellar@hotmail.co.uk  
ABOUT ME 
I have always been a keen problem solver with a love for maths, chemistry and physics. This was the catalyst for me 
exploring a career in chemical engineering. My time at university and in my career to date has allowed me to develop 
my knowledge and understanding of the sector and I have been able to use my ability to analyse and react to situations 
productively in order to complete projects. 
 
I am always keen to test myself, both in my personal and professional life, and always aim to make the most of any 
opportunity that is presented to me. This has been shown by my willingness to travel and integrate myself into different 
cultures without losing my own sense of identity.  
 
EMPLOYMENT 
WHESSOE Engineering  
Process and Safety Engineer (March 2020 – present) 
 Responsible for originating and checking process philosophies and design calculations for cryogenic storage 
tanks and terminal ensuring compliance with UK and local legislation. 
 Responsible for originating and checking safety philosophies, specifications and layout drawings for cryogenic 
storage tanks and terminals in compliance with relevant codes and standards. Accountable for performing 
radiation and dispersion modelling and analysis within Phast software.  
 Liaise with all disciplines in the production of design documentation for major international clients 
 Undertake and manage internal audits to ensure compliance with company procedures 
 
CRODA Rawcliffe Bridge (Upper Tier COMAH Site) 
Process Engineer (January 2018 – February 2020) 
 Leading problem solving and championing continuous improvement within the manufacturing plant to improve 
efficiency and enable growth including scale up of new products.  
 Active participation and scribe in Safety studies such as Hazard Studies and LOPA’s. 
 Design, install, commissioning and budgeting/cost control of improvement projects on Polymer Plant through 
CAPEX’s.  
 Production of operating instructions and procedures for new equipment and products. 
 Liaising with discipline engineers, maintenance, management and external contractors/consultants including 
insurance inspectors during surveys.  
 
CRODA Hull 
Process Engineer (October 2017 – January 2018) 
 Data gathering and verification of Pressure Relief Dossiers to meet site dossier completion goal.  
 Design, install and commissioning of pump.  
 Liaising with external consultants.   
 
CRODA Cowick  
Graduate Trainee - Group SHE (Sept 2016 – October 2017) 
 Identification of improvement opportunities for Effluent Treatment Plants (ETP) around the Croda Global Group. 
 Collating, analysing and producing reports on data from 18 manufacturing sites globally to identify possible 
future sustainability and environmental corporate targets. 
 Taking the lead role for the Intelex Sustainability Performance Indicators Module Implementation for quarterly 
reporting to head office.  
 Reporting of findings through presentations to relevant groups such as SHE Managers, Site Directors and 
Engineering Managers. 
 Leading one topic area (Control of Contractors) for an audit on a site. 
 Participating in Process Safety discussions and undertaking testing of trial criteria for the marking of hazard 
studies. 
  MHAIRI SELLAR 
Process and Safety Engineer 
CRODA Rawcliffe Bridge (Upper Tier COMAH Site) 
Graduate Trainee - Responsible Engineer for the Effluent Treatment Plant (October 2015 – August 2016) 
 Oversee commissioning and completion of required documentation including supervision of contractors to 
commission the effluent scrubber.  
 Managing CAPEX improvement modifications to the effluent plant from design through to operation.  
 Solving day to day running problems associated with the plant.  
 Actively involved in pre implementation stages of a new oscillating baffle reactor technology arriving to site.  
 
CRODA Gouda, The Netherlands   
Graduate Trainee  - SHE Department (Sept 2014 – Sept 2015) 
 Updating the ATEX explosion safety documents to comply with new legi

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
